name: Dimension Hop
description:
Game play made in 3 hours for Trijam #121. 
Menus made after.
Theme: Exploring spacetime

Controls
Move: A & D or Left & Right Arrows
Jump: W or SPACE or Up Arrow

In this game an interdimensional jewel thief has lost their diamond haul mid jump. Causing diamonds to appear and disappear throughout the timelines in this one location. You hop between 6 to collect as many diamonds as you can. Watch out for the interdimensional cleaners that can also pass through spacetime. 

*I'm sorry if you have difficulty with color blindness. I'm afraid in the time limit I was unable to find a solution that wasn't just color. But the portals are always the same, the top to got the the dimensions to the right and left of the one you are in. The bottoms go 2 to the right or left. *
